entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 07:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNW 20 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
